entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
